flawed_nl_solution:
The 3 cars take 3*40=<<3*40=120>>120 minutes to make
He repairs 5-3=<<5-3=5>>5 more cars
They each take 40*0.5=<<40*0.5=20>>20 minutes longer per car
So they each take 40+20=<<40+20=60>>60 minutes
So he repaired cars for 120+5*60=<<120+5*60=420>>420 minutes
That is 420/60=<<420/60=7>>7 hours
So he made 7*20=$140<<7*20=140>>140

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2, not 5. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
